result.name: hr-information
result.notes: Held on Snowdrop, with U-Access as the ‘front end’ self service end of the database, this is a database of staff who have been employed at the UK Commission for Employment and Skills. Includes service history, job title, contact details, their line manager, age, gender and next of kin, salary details, bank details and NI number.

organization.name: uk-commission-for-employment-and-skills
organization.title: UK Commission for Employment and Skills

result.title: HR information

extras.value: N/A Internal Use Only.  Due to the sensitive nature of this information and the fact that it was received in confidence, this information will not be released.
